attributes.action: Make a new skate park in Guiseley
attributes.additional_details:
The quality of our park is very dated compared to Idle and Sailtaire for example they're all concrete, perfectly smooth & safe to ride our parks worn & not flush with the ground thsi is a hazard. 
Also a new park would help with businesses such as McDonald's as youths today hang round there if they had a park it could also help them to find a new hobbie. 
Nunroide was also featured in sidewalk mag as the one of the worse skatepark in The UK and for the skaters & the comunity this should change.
attributes.background: A lot of people have been injured or put off by the poor quality of ramps at nunroide, we either have to travel to other parks or pay to skateboard in a indoor park which is expensive...A new park would also help youths of today it would give them something to do instead of being on the streets.

rejection.details:
Providing facilities of this nature is a matter for Leeds City Council, not the UK Government or Parliament.

More details about raising a local concern with Leeds City Council are available here:

http://www.leeds.gov.uk/council/Pages/How-to-raise-a-local-concern.aspx
